Trade/Device Name(s): BD Kiestra Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) Application
Regulation Name(s): Automated Image Assessment System For Microbial Colonies On Solid Culture Media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Kiestra MRSA App, an in vitro diagnostic software for automated image analysis to aid in screening for nasal MRSA colonization using the BD Kiestra Laboratory Automation Solution.
Indications for Use Summary: In-vitro diagnostic software applied to digital images of BD BBL CHROMagar MRSA II plates inoculated with anterior nares samples to qualitatively assess colony growth and detect MRSA nasal colonization, aiding prevention and control of MRSA infection; not for guiding, diagnosing, or monitoring MRSA infections or susceptibility testing.
